fresh-loot-highlight.config.enable_picku: Show a warning when an item is picked up.
Group multiple pickup warnings together within a set time window.
fresh-loot-highlight.config.pickup_warni: Select the duration before a warning disappears
Duration before a pickup warning disappears.
Select the display style of the pickup warnings
Select the display style for the pickup warning HUD.
Select the position of the pickup warnings on the HUD
Position of the pickup warning on the HUD.
Show the picked item in the pickup warning HUD.
fresh-loot-highlight.config.enable_slot_: Toggle the highlight of newly acquired items in the inventory
Highlight inventory slots when new items are added.
fresh-loot-highlight.config.enable_pick_: Toggle the Narrator for pickup warnings
Narrate pickup warnings using the narrator.
